original_title: An Evening of the Blues with Gary Moore and the Midight Blues Band
overview: Includes perforance of 12 songs: Oh Pretty Woman, Walking by Myself, All Your Love, Still Got the Blues, Too Tired, Farther on Up the Road, Texas Strut, Moving On, Midnight Blues, King of the Blues, Stormy Monday & Caldonia.
title: An Evening of the Blues with Gary Moore and the Midight Blues Band
